remarks: If it is not the case that two classes are equal, they are unequal. Converse of ~ neneqd .  One-way deduction form of ~ df-ne . (Contributed by David Moews, 28-Feb-2017.)  Allow a shortening of ~ necon3bi .  (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 22-Nov-2019.)
statement:
neqned.1 $e |- ( ph -> -. A = B ) $.
neqned $p |- ( ph -> A =/= B ) $.
